content.text:
# 22nd Golden Globe Awards

The 22nd Golden Globe Awards, honoring the best in film and television for 1964, were held on February 8, 1965.
Winners and nominees
won for Becket]]
won for The Pumpkin Eater]]
won for My Fair Lady]]
won for Mary Poppins]]
won for Hush...Hush, Sweet Charlotte]]
Film
{| class="wikitable" style="width=100%"

|-
! style="width=50%" |Drama
! style="width=50%" |Comedy or Musical
|-

** The Chalk Garden

** The Night of the Iguana

| valign="top" |
*' My Fair Lady'
** Father Goose
** Mary Poppins
** The Unsinkable Molly Brown
** The World of Henry Orient

| valign="top" |
